title: Which are the best schools in Amravati? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, every school has its own share of pros and cons. A choice should be made based on your idea of near perfection. My opinion in this case would be none other than ‘The Golden Kids English School.’ I will point out the reasons: Most of the faculties are well educated and do have good bonding with students.(But they also turn into fire breathing dragons when one talks a lot or disturbs them during the lecture :P)The teachers are always ready to help the students not only with the academics but also with other exams like NCO, NSO,IMO,ISO,etc.An all round development of the child can be expected as sports are also valued.Drawing, Essay-writing,Handwriting,Recitation of Sanskrit verses,etc. competitions take place all round the year.This enhances various skills of the child.Not only English but for some section of students the course is taught in Semi-English also.(i.e except maths and science the other subjects are in Marathi.)Last but not the least, the talent of students is recognised there!

It depends on the board you want to study in. In Amravati there are Maharashtra state board, CBSE and ICSE board schools. If you are looking for Maharashtra State Board schools I'll suggest •Deepa English Primary School, Sai nagar. •Holy Cross Convent. Only for girls. •Dyanmata. Co-Edu. For CBSE board. I don't know if they are Delhi board or Chennai board. But there are a few CBSE schools in Amravati. •School of Scholars. •Indo Public/Indo Kids. For ICSE •Tomoae. •Poddar International School. •Titans Public School. For now I could think of the above mentioned schools as per the board. There are a few more schools but I don't know about their boards. They are •Edify. •K K cambridge. I hope I helped you. Tkcr :) Edit 1– Thanks Amit Gawai for the edit.
